Articles.Content:
I see lots of people asking "How do I build a..."

[Sub-orbital craft for one Kerbal?](http://imgur.com/a/arKpL#0)

[Sub-orbital craft for one Kerbal and a Tourist?](http://imgur.com/a/arKpL#1)

[Kerbin orbiter?](http://imgur.com/a/arKpL#2)

[Mun flyby craft?](http://imgur.com/a/arKpL#3)

[Mun orbiter craft?](http://imgur.com/a/arKpL#4)

These are not the only ways to build a...

These are not the best ways to build a...

These are some suggestions on how you could build a...

I hope they help you.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-28T01:38:56Z" title="09/28/2015 01:38  AM" data-short="8 yr">September 28, 2015</time> by Phil deCube**

I added some more craft.

[Moon/Duna Lander](http://imgur.com/a/arKpL#5)

[Moon Lander Launch System](http://imgur.com/a/arKpL#6)

[Ike/Duna Launch System](http://imgur.com/a/arKpL#7)

[Nuclear Tugs](http://imgur.com/a/arKpL#8)

As before, these are not meant to be ideal craft. These are suggestions for people who are new and having trouble.
